Hitachi."},{"lineNumber":26448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、それや！　確かにそう名乗っとったわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's it! They definitely introduced themselves that way!\""},{"lineNumber":26449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういえば……！　家出して、砂漠に……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now that you mention it... they ran away from home and went to the desert...?"},{"lineNumber":26450,"originalJapaneseLine":"　暑いの、ポピンズだから平気だったんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Because it's hot, Poppins was fine with it...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニャガス王国の、東芝王子に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Prince Toshiba of the Kingdom of Anyagas!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶらか、された……んですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You were... deceived, weren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうに決まっておる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's for sure!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、東芝王子と一緒になると言い出して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, she said she'd be with Prince Toshiba...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が反対したら、姿を消してしもうた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I opposed it, she disappeared!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありゃー……でも、これってもしかして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh no... but, could this possibly be...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。王子と王女の……駆け落ち？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. A prince and princess... eloping?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だとしたら……なんだかロマンチックですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case... it's kind of romantic, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くだらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nonsense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とまあ、これがふたつめ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, that's the second thing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が娘、日立を探しだして欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to find my daughter, Hitachi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らも探しておるが、どうも地上に消えたらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are also searching, but it seems she vanished onto the surface.
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「地上に消えた、ってなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Vanished to the surface, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世間知らずのお姫様だろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's an innocent, naive princess, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっくに騙されてレイプされて売られたと思うぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I bet she's already been deceived, raped, and sold off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラ、ランス様……親御さんに、そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance... saying that to the parents like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬぅおおおお！　日立ぃーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nuuooooh! Hitachiーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかん！　日立に似合うのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No! What suits Hitachi is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: らぶらぶエッチなんじゃ！　ノーレイプ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lovey-dovey lovemaking! No rape!"
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気位の高いあの娘が、ベッドで愛する男に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That proud girl, in bed with the man she loves,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トロトロに蕩かされる瞬間をこっそり覗く為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm alive just to secretly peek at the moment she melts completely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂は生きておるというのにィーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at that instant in bed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーと……親馬鹿……なの、これ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, um... is this just being a doting parent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか違う気がするけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel like it's kind of different though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、王さん。それならその相手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Lord. In that case, why not that partner be

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東芝王子でもよかったんと違うの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Toshiba instead?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騙されとったらどうする！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What if she's being deceived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから慎重に冷静にと言ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you to be cautious and calm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その次の日には……うぎぎぎ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then the next day... ughhh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが解決せんと、戦争なんぞに集中できん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If this isn't resolved, we can't focus on the war!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というわけで、頼んだぞい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I'm counting on you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「の、覗く、って言ってましたけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-You said you'd be 'peeking' though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん。自分でどうこうする、なんぞという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. I have no dirty thoughts of doing anything myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚れた思想は持ち合わせとらんぞい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not in my pure mindset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザッツ健全」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's wholesome."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙れ変態親父」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, perverted old man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は満鉄王との会見を終え、外に出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others finished their meeting with King Mantetsu and went outside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー……それにしても、どうしましょうランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haah... even so, what should we do, Lord Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのお姫様……日立さんでしたっけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That princess... was it Hitachi-san?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「探せと言われてもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if we're told to search for her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手がかりも何もない、小人一匹だぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have neither clues nor anything; she's just a tiny person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見世物小屋でも当たってみる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Should we check out the sideshow tents or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「めんどくさいな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a pain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな地道な手段しかないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there no other way but these tedious methods?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日立……日立……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hitachi... Hitachi...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、どーっかで聞いたで、あの名前……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I've heard that name somewhere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当か？　誰か商売相手とかか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really? Someone related to business or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……そうじゃなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... not really,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割と最近、ランスの近くで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: quite recently, close to Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砂漠の案内人だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A desert guide.
"Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、ローブずぼーって被ってた人。日立」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person with the robe pulled far over their head. Hitachi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、それや！　確かにそう名乗っとったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's it! They definitely introduced themselves that way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……！　家出して、砂漠に……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it... they ran away from home and went to the desert...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暑いの、ポピンズだから平気だったんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because it's hot, Poppins was fine with it..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニャガス王国の、東芝王子に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Prince Toshiba of the Kingdom of Anyagas!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶらか、された……んですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You were... deceived, weren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうに決まっておる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's for sure!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、東芝王子と一緒になると言い出して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, she said she'd be with Prince Toshiba...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が反対したら、姿を消してしもうた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I opposed it, she disappeared!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありゃー……でも、これってもしかして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh no... but, could this possibly be...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。王子と王女の……駆け落ち？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. A prince and princess... eloping?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だとしたら……なんだかロマンチックですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case... it's kind of romantic, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くだらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nonsense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とまあ、これがふたつめ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, that's the second thing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が娘、日立を探しだして欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to find my daughter, Hitachi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らも探しておるが、どうも地上に消えたらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are also searching, but it seems she vanished onto the surface.
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「地上に消えた、ってなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Vanished to the surface, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世間知らずのお姫様だろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's an innocent, naive princess, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっくに騙されてレイプされて売られたと思うぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I bet she's already been deceived, raped, and sold off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラ、ランス様……親御さんに、そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance... saying that to the parents like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬぅおおおお！　日立ぃーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nuuooooh! Hitachiーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかん！　日立に似合うのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No! What suits Hitachi is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: らぶらぶエッチなんじゃ！　ノーレイプ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lovey-dovey lovemaking! No rape!"
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気位の高いあの娘が、ベッドで愛する男に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That proud girl, in bed with the man she loves,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トロトロに蕩かされる瞬間をこっそり覗く為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm alive just to secretly peek at the moment she melts completely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂は生きておるというのにィーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at that instant in bed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーと……親馬鹿……なの、これ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, um... is this just being a doting parent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか違う気がするけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel like it's kind of different though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、王さん。それならその相手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Lord. In that case, why not that partner be

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東芝王子でもよかったんと違うの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Toshiba instead?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騙されとったらどうする！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What if she's being deceived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから慎重に冷静にと言ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you to be cautious and calm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その次の日には……うぎぎぎ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then the next day... ughhh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが解決せんと、戦争なんぞに集中できん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If this isn't resolved, we can't focus on the war!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というわけで、頼んだぞい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I'm counting on you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「の、覗く、って言ってましたけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-You said you'd be 'peeking' though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん。自分でどうこうする、なんぞという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. I have no dirty thoughts of doing anything myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚れた思想は持ち合わせとらんぞい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not in my pure mindset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザッツ健全」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's wholesome."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙れ変態親父」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, perverted old man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は満鉄王との会見を終え、外に出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others finished their meeting with King Mantetsu and went outside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー……それにしても、どうしましょうランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haah... even so, what should we do, Lord Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのお姫様……日立さんでしたっけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That princess... was it Hitachi-san?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「探せと言われてもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if we're told to search for her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手がかりも何もない、小人一匹だぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have neither clues nor anything; she's just a tiny person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見世物小屋でも当たってみる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Should we check out the sideshow tents or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「めんどくさいな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a pain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな地道な手段しかないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there no other way but these tedious methods?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日立……日立……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hitachi... Hitachi...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、どーっかで聞いたで、あの名前……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I've heard that name somewhere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当か？　誰か商売相手とかか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really? Someone related to business or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……そうじゃなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... not really,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割と最近、ランスの近くで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: quite recently, close to Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砂漠の案内人だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A desert guide.
"Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、ローブずぼーって被ってた人。日立」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person with the robe pulled far over their head. Hitachi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、それや！　確かにそう名乗っとったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's it! They definitely introduced themselves that way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……！　家出して、砂漠に……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it... they ran away from home and went to the desert...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暑いの、ポピンズだから平気だったんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because it's hot, Poppins was fine with it..."
